name: Dongtube Api'S
description: Simple and easy to use API documentation.

items.name: Ai Img2img
items.desc: Generate image you prompt

items.name: Nsfw Check
items.desc: Check Nsfw from url Image

items.name: YouTube Search
items.desc: Search videos on YouTube and return metadata

params.q: Search query (e.g. song title, channel, keyword)

items.name: TikTok Search
items.desc: Search videos on TikTok and return metadata

params.q: Search query (keyword to search TikTok videos)

items.name: Pinterest Search
items.desc: Search Pinterest pins and return random image results

items.name: Blue Archive
items.desc: Get random high-quality Blue Archive character images

items.name: Random Neko
items.desc: Fetch random anime Neko images

items.name: Random Waifu
items.desc: Fetch random anime Waifu images

items.name: Anime Quotes
items.desc: Fetch random quotes from anime characters

items.name: Pinterest Downloader
items.desc: Download images, videos, or GIFs from Pinterest pins

items.name: Spotify Downloader
items.desc: Downlod audio from Spotify

items.name: Instagram Downloader
items.desc: Download images or videos from Instagram

items.name: Xiaohongshu Downloader
items.desc: Download videos or images from Xiaohongshu (RED) posts

items.name: YouTube video DL
items.desc: Download videos from YouTube

items.name: Twitter Downloader
items.desc: Download images and video from Twitter

items.name: TikTok Downloader
items.desc: Download videos (with/without watermark) from TikTok

items.name: Remini
items.desc: Enhance the quality of a low-resolution image using AI.

params.url: Public URL of the image to enhance (Supports GET & POST)

items.name: Remini v2
items.desc: Enhance the quality of a low-resolution image using AI.

params.url: Public URL of the image to enhance (Supports GET & POST)

items.name: Image OCR
items.desc: Extract text from images using AI-powered OCR.

params.url: Public URL of the image to extract text from (Supports GET & POST)

items.name: Removebg
items.desc: Remove background.

params.url: Public URL of the image to remove background (Supports GET & POST)

items.name: BRAT Generator
items.desc: Generate BRAT-style text images with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT image (required)

items.name: BRAT Video Generator
items.desc: Generate animated BRAT-style text videos with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT video (required)
